Package com.github.m5c.livepoll.controllers

Class WebControllers

java.lang.Object
com.github.m5c.livepoll.controllers.WebControllers
@Controller
public class WebControllers
extends Object
Thymeleaf endpoint for all web controllers, is to say all resources that forward to a thymeleaf template and are strictly non-REST.
Author:
Maximilian Schiedermeier

      public WebControllers​(@Autowired PollManager pollManager)

  • Method Details

    • forwardToMenu

      @RequestMapping("/") public String forwardToMenu​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Root menu endpoint. Only available to localhsot.
      Parameters:
      request - as the inbound http request.
      Returns:
      pointer to thymeleaf template used for page rendering.

    • quickPoll

      @RequestMapping("/quick") public String quickPoll​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Quick poll endpoint, only accessible for localhost access / rejects foreign clients.
      Parameters:
      request - as the http request object used to determine the client's origin.
      Returns:
      string corresponding to the target thymeleaf template.

    • loadPack

      @RequestMapping("/load") public String loadPack​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Quick poll endpoint, only accessible for localhost access / rejects foreign clients.
      Parameters:
      request - as the http request object used to determine the client's origin.
      Returns:
      string corresponding to the target thymeleaf template.

    • accessPoll

      @RequestMapping("/polls/{pollid}") public String accessPoll​(@PathVariable("pollid") String pollid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Thymeleaf endpoint for a specific poll. Only accessible from localhost.
      Parameters:
      pollid - as the id of the poll to be rendered to a webpage.
      model - as the thymeleaf model that stores variables in the server side page rendering.
      request - as the http request object needed to determine the client origin.
      Returns:
      string corresponding to target thymeleaf template.

    • getImageWithMediaType

      @GetMapping(value="/polls/{pollid}/qr/{option}", produces="image/png") @ResponseBody public byte[] getImageWithMediaType​(@PathVariable("pollid") String pollid, @PathVariable("option") String option, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException
      Helper method to access QR code png files stored on disk. Local references are blocked by browsers security policy, so we need an HTTP tunnel (reexposure of file on disk as web resource).
      Parameters:
      pollid - as the id of the qr code option to look up
      option - as the selected vote option
      request - as the connection http opeject, required to identify connects form other machines and reject them.
      Returns:
      ByteStream of QR png with required Meta media type.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case the file is not found / cannot be read.
